name: Hopping Boys
description:
This is a story about a red little boy with his adventure. He called Hopping Boys. 

He must finish his adventure. He travels across the snow, desert, volcano, and any more. 

You must help him finish his adventure.

How to Play

- Use Left Click to jump

- Get coins to buy items

Features

- Many levels

- More adventures

- Easy to be played

- Nice graphic

- Classic playing style
